titleStmt.title: A gagg for the new Gospell? No: a nevv gagg for an old goose VVho would needes vndertake to stop all Protestants mouths for euer, with 276. places out of their owne English Bibles. Or an ansvvere to a late abridger of controuersies, and belyar of the Protestants doctrine. By Richard Mountagu. Published by authoritie.
titleStmt.author: Montagu, Richard, 1577-1641.

titleStmt.title: A gagg for the new Gospell? No: a nevv gagg for an old goose VVho would needes vndertake to stop all Protestants mouths for euer, with 276. places out of their owne English Bibles. Or an ansvvere to a late abridger of controuersies, and belyar of the Protestants doctrine. By Richard Mountagu. Published by authoritie.
titleStmt.author: Montagu, Richard, 1577-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Snodham for Matthew Lownes and William Barret,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Heigham, John or Roger. The gagge of the new Gospel.
Running title reads: An answere to the late gagger of Protestants.
Reproduction of the original in University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
